title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.22 - Verification of winning cards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.22 - Verification of winning cards

State Regulations
A verification of the numbers appearing on the winning
card at the time a winner is determined shall be made in the immediate presence
of one or more disinterested players. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4820.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
